text: Bourjein - Marjiyat () is a populated area in the Chouf District of Lebanon. The area is approximately 300 meters high and has a school with about 80 students which closed at the time of Lebanese civil war.Bourjein - Marjiyat (Chouf) Localiban ==References== Category:Populated places in Chouf District
title: Bourjein et Marjiyat
